Title: Babar Naam Gandhiji
Actors: Parambrata Chatterjee, Saayoni Ghosh, Surajit Mukherjee, Koushik Sen
Plot: Babar Naam Gandhiji is about Mahatma Gandhi and modern society through the eyes of street child. The film is based around a boy named Kencho, who has an encounter with the Father of the ...
